fpond_gauss.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ==================================================================
00003 !
00004 !                        PONDEROMOTIVE FORCE
00005 !
00006 !  Compute relativistic fpond for standing wave field
00007 !
00008 ! ==================================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine fpond(t,tpulse,sigma0,vosc,omega,xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipon)
00011 
00012 
00013   real, intent(in) :: t ! time
00014   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration
00015   real, intent(in) :: vosc ! quiver strength
00016   real, intent(in) :: sigma0 ! pulse width (1/e)
00017   real, intent(in) :: omega ! laser frequency
00018   real, intent(in) :: xd,yd,zd ! position to evaluate force; xd is away from target
00019 
00020   real, intent(out) :: phipon, epon_x, epon_y, epon_z ! pond. potential and fields
00021 
00022   real :: xf, yf, zf, Tpon, Rpon, Xpon, gamma, sigma, atten
00023 
00024   !  linear rise
00025   Tpon = 2*vosc**2*min(1.,t/tpulse) * (sin(omega*t))**2
00026 
00027   sigma = sigma0*sqrt(1.+abs(xd)**2/4./sigma0**2) ! take Rayleigh length 2*sigma0
00028 
00029   Rpon = exp((-yd**2-zd**2)/sigma**2)
00030 
00031   !  Standing wave in vacuum; evanescent in overdense plasma
00032   if (xd.ge.0) then
00033      xf = sin(2*omega*xd)
00034      Xpon = cos(omega*xd)**2
00035   else
00036      xf = -2*exp(2*xd)
00037      Xpon = exp(2*xd)
00038   endif
00039 
00040   yf = -yd/sigma**2     ! suppress radial fpond for scale-model
00041   zf = -zd/sigma**2
00042   atten = sigma0**2/sigma**2
00043   phipon = Tpon*Xpon*Rpon*atten  ! include attenuation factor
00044 
00045   gamma = sqrt(1.+abs(phipon)/2.)
00046 
00047   Epon_x = Tpon*Rpon/4/gamma*xf*atten
00048   Epon_y = phipon/2/gamma*yf
00049   Epon_z = phipon/2/gamma*zf
00050 ! Epon_y = 0.
00051 ! Epon_z = 0.
00052 
00053 end subroutine fpond
